title: Chili Lime Chicken Burgers
directions: Combine ground chicken, diced red pepper, minced cilantro, minced garlic, sea salt, pepper, and lime juice in a bowl. Use hands to mix well (but don’t overmix). Form mixture into 2 patties. Grill until desired doneness.
Dress your burger up: Top it with cheese, avocado, salsa, or guacamole – just remember to count any toppings in your Success Journal!
ingredients: 1/2 lbs. chicken, ground, free-range, organic2 tbs. bell pepper, red, fresh, organic1 tbs. cilantro, fresh, organic2 clove garlic, fresh, organic1/4 tsp. sea salt, unrefined and pure1/8 tsp. red pepper flakes, crushed, organic1/8 tsp. black pepper, ground, organic1/2 tbs. lime juice, pure, organic
